name: Small World Survival
description:
The Earth is in danger, protect this small world from the massive planets. 

 Neptune, Uranus, Saturn and Jupiter have declared that there will only be 4 planets in the solar system, the choice is simple submit and become one of their moons slave to their gravity and will or be destroyed. The rest of the planets have already been destroyed or enslaved the small world of Earth is all that remains, protect the earth.

Use WASD or arrow keys to move, press J to launch continental mass at opponents.
